body_html:
Note that libtensorflow_cc.so has a dependency on libtensorflow_framework.so.
Can you run: otool -L libtensorflow_cc.so and provide the output?

I suspect what's happening is that the linker isn't finding libtensorflow_framework.so in its path.
When we build the C libraries for release we package both libraries and set the rpath appropriately.

body:
Note that `libtensorflow_cc.so` has a dependency on `libtensorflow_framework.so`.
Can you run: `otool -L libtensorflow_cc.so` and provide the output? 

I suspect what's happening is that the linker isn't finding `libtensorflow_framework.so` in its path.
When we build the C libraries for release we package both libraries and set the `rpath` appropriately.
